lex.text: Angola is in Pleasant Township which is part of Steuben County, in Indiana, in the United States. The country where English is spoken, and where Asian Americans are one of the ethnic groups.

lex.text: English is the language of the United States, where there is an ethnic group called Asian Americans. Also part of the US is the town of Angola, which can be found in Pleasant Township, Steuben County, Indiana.
